item.title: Securinets CTF 2k19 Lost Flag Writeup
item.author: admin@omega-coder.me (omega_coder)
item.description: Description Category Points Solves Forensics 994 19 Description : Help me get back my flag ! URL: https://web8.ctfsecurinets.com/ After visiting the link above, we get a login page.We can login using admin/admin, but unfortunately the flag is deleted. Then I started searching in the website for any other infos, but with no success. the admin of the challenge (Tr'GFx) said that bruteforcing directories is enough to solve the challenge, so I used dirsearch.
